title: A Whole New Way To Earn IP(Idea)
body:
I thought, its too hard to earn Ip, Riot wants us to pay money for things, cause everyone needs money, why not be able to earn IP from watching ads?
riot benefits from it, so do you.
should be - 30s Video = 10 Ip
That sounds too op?
but ip grinding is so boring
all you do is play broken no fun champs to earn IP
so i highly suggest riot makes this a thing, and have fun!
